Description: Loyal as a hound, proud as a lion, and fast as the wind.
Your bond with this canine cements your place as leader of the pack.
An apex predator, and your friend through all troubles.
Imposing iron barding conceals a will as hard as steel.
The claws of a natural hunter, matched with the steel of a knight on the warpath.
Quiet as a cat and as solid as iron.
A nomad's soul. No home but the road ahead.
A wolf without a pack is like a ghost in the fog.
A solitary hunter. The greatest threats are often those unseen.
Quick as the North wind, as ashen as fresh fallen snow.
Fangs like fresh ice, and a coat like the snow on the mountaintops.
It is said that the white lion is the messenger of a higher power.
Dark as midnight, and as fast as a falling star.
Some say the wolves of twilight are an ill omen. But yours is loyal as the dawn.
Black lions herald the ending of one age, and the start of the next.
A flaxen-maned beauty with the heart of a racer.
Gray as smoke with fire in its eyes.
A rare breed, this majestic beast comes to the aid of those whose hearts remain wild.
Felix wears his horned helm proudly. It boasts his might and majesty.
Smokey's stealth poise earnt him much acclaim. Enemies do not see him coming.
Alacer's boundless energy defies laws of nature. Sleep is for the weak.
Rumor states Daemonicus was born of dark ritual. True or not, their vigor is not in question.
Riding Malum evokes fear in the heart of your foe and allies alike.
While Sicarius is unusually cold to the touch, in their belly the fires burn.
You will never forget that fateful day when you saw Moonshadow by the river bank.
Sold by the horse vendor who assures Benson's good nature and faithfulness is second to none.
Golda's high opinion of themself is justifiable. They're both powerful and beautiful.
Runa's mighty appetite keeps the food bill totting up. Perhaps that's why the vendor is willing to sell such a magnificent beast.
Your reward for rescuing the wolves from their cages. May the pack forever be in your debt.
Wolfgang is the strong, silent type. Until they unleash their deafening howl.
Kodger's sandy orange fur is their source of pride, hence they like to keep it clean.
Your reward for navigating the cliff-face to rescue the caged lion. Great to have friends in high places.
Scurge has a certain majestic quality making them the envy of the pride.
Godfrey's always been lucky even as a cub. May their good fortune rub off on you.
